jcurses.widgets
类 GridLayoutManager

java.lang.Object
  jcurses.widgets.LayoutManager
      jcurses.widgets.GridLayoutManager
所有已实现的接口：
WidgetsConstants
public class GridLayoutManager
extends LayoutManager
implements WidgetsConstants

This class is a layout manager that works like as the DefaultLayoutManager with an difference: the painting rectangle is shared in many grid cells and the constraints are stated not in real coodinates on the painting rectangle, but in 'grid-coordinates'

字段摘要
 
从类 jcurses.widgets.LayoutManager 继承的字段
_father
 
从接口 jcurses.widgets.WidgetsConstants 继承的字段
ALIGNMENT_BOTTOM, ALIGNMENT_CENTER, ALIGNMENT_LEFT, ALIGNMENT_RIGHT, ALIGNMENT_TOP

          Adds a widget to the boundeb container

GridLayoutManager

public GridLayoutManager(int width,
                         int height)
The constructor

参数：
width - the width of the grid ( in cells )
height - the height of the grid ( in cells )
方法详细信息

layout

public void layout(Widget widget,
                   LayoutConstraint constraint)
从类 LayoutManager 复制的描述
The method layouts a widget within a container, dependet of layouting constraints.

指定者：
类 LayoutManager 中的 layout
参数：
widget - widget to layout
constraint - layout constraint

addWidget

public void addWidget(Widget widget,
                      int x,
                      int y,
                      int width,
                      int height,
                      int verticalConstraint,
                      int horizontalConstraint)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Adds a widget to the boundeb container

参数：
widget - widget to be added
x - the column index of the top left corner of the rectangle, within that the widget is placed
y - the row index of the top left corner of the rectangle, within that the widget is placed
width - the number of columns, within that the widget is placed
height - the number of rows, within that the widget is placed
verticalConstraint - vertical alignment constraint. Following values a possible: WidgetConstraints.ALIGNMENT_CENTER,WidgetConstraints.ALIGNMENT_TOP,WidgetConstraints.ALIGNMENT_BOTTOM
horizontalConstraint - vertical alignment constraint, Following values are possible: WidgetConstraints.ALIGNMENT_CENTER,WidgetConstraints.ALIGNMENT_LEFT,WidgetConstraints.ALIGNMENT_RIGHT
抛出：
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

removeWidget

public void removeWidget(Widget widget)
Removes a widget

参数：
widget - widget to remove
